channel.title: CVE Feed for RSA -- RSA Identity Governance and Lifecycle
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RSA -- RSA Identity Governance and Lifecycle

item.title: CVE-2018-1255|2024-09-17T02:16:59.328Z -- rsa -- rsa%20identity%20governance%20and%20lifecycle
item.description: RSA Identity Lifecycle and Governance versions 7.0.1, 7.0.2 and 7.1.0 contains a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability by tricking a victim application user to supply malicious HTML or JavaScript code to a vulnerable web application, which is then reflected back to the victim and executed by the web browser.
